statements: SELECT * FROM IoT_Data WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM IoT_Data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT humidity, temperature FROM IoT_Data WHERE humidity < 50 AND temperature > 20 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM IoT_Data;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS records FROM IoT_Data GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY records DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoT_Data WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM IoT_Data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, AVG(temperature) as avg_temp, MAX(humidity) as max_humidity FROM IoT_Data GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY avg_temp DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoT_Data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND temperature > 20;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) as data_points FROM IoT_Data GROUP BY device_id HAVING data_points > 10 ORDER BY data_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_type = 'sensor';
SELECT device_id, location FROM IoTDevices WHERE status = true;
SELECT device_type, location FROM IoTDevices WHERE location LIKE '%room%';
SELECT * FROM DeviceData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, data_value FROM DeviceData WHERE data_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_id, device_type, status FROM IoTDevices WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT device_id, location, data_value FROM IoTDevices JOIN DeviceData ON IoTDevices.device_id = DeviceData.device_id WHERE data_value > 50;
SELECT device_id, location FROM IoTDevices WHERE location LIKE 'Kitchen%';
SELECT AVG(data_value) FROM DeviceData;
SELECT * FROM IoT_devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoT_devices WHERE status = true;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM IoT_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) FROM IoT_devices GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT * FROM Sensor_data WHERE sensor_type='temperature' ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM IoT_devices;
SELECT * FROM Sensor_data WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoT_devices WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT sensor_type, value, timestamp FROM Sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT device_type FROM IoT_devices;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_type, location FROM devices WHERE location='Office';
SELECT MAX(last_update) AS latest_update FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location, last_update FROM devices WHERE device_type='Smartphone' OR device_type='Tablet' ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, location, last_update FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT device_name, sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM devices JOIN sensor_data ON devices.device_id = sensor_data.device_id;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, command_type, command_value, sent_time FROM devices JOIN commands ON devices.device_id = commands.device_id ORDER BY sent_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM DEVICE;
SELECT device_name, location FROM DEVICE WHERE status='active';
SELECT sensor_name, data_type, unit_of_measurement FROM SENSOR ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT id, alert_type, value_threshold FROM ALERT WHERE alert_type='critical' ORDER BY value_threshold DESC;
SELECT * FROM DATA_STREAM WHERE value > 50;
SELECT device_name, location, device_type FROM DEVICE WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT sensor_name, data_type, unit_of_measurement FROM SENSOR WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, value FROM DATA_STREAM WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM ALERT WHERE alert_type = 'critical' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT alert_type, timestamp, action_taken FROM ALERT JOIN DECISION ON ALERT.id = DECISION.alert_id WHERE DECISION.action_taken = 'acknowledged';
